name: Factors of the Largest Product
description:
You receive and array of numbers as an input. 

Return a pair of numbers in an array that produce the largest possitive product and the multiplier is the largest number.

The number to be multiplied is the 'multiplicand' and the number by which it is multiplied is the 'multiplier.'

example input:
[5, 6, 7, 10, 15, 19, 90]

returns:
[19, 90]
